name: Data Scientist (Sustainability) Full Curriculum (EQF Level 7)
description: Full curriculum for Data Scientist (Sustainability) at EQF Level 7
program_learning_outcomes: Critically evaluate advanced theories and emerging trends in digital sustainability and their implications for organizations
Design and lead complex sustainable digital transformation initiatives aligned with organizational strategy
Synthesize knowledge from multiple disciplines to develop innovative sustainable solutions to digital challenges
Evaluate and optimize sustainability performance across digital systems and organizational processes
Demonstrate strategic leadership in promoting sustainable digital practices and embedding them in organizational culture
Lead multi-stakeholder initiatives to address systemic sustainability challenges through digital innovation

Design innovative assessment frameworks for complex sustainability challenges.

modules.name: Digital Sustainability Research Project
modules.description: Research-based exploration of digital sustainability challenges
learning_outcomes: Evaluate sustainable project outcomes for sustainable business practices
Create innovative solutions using sustainable project outcomes to address complex sustainability challenges in circular economy applications
Transform project management methodologies that integrate sustainability metrics throughout the project lifecycle
Recommend ethical leadership in promoting digital sustainability research project solutions that prioritize environmental stewardship
Critically evaluate the effectiveness of digital sustainability research project approaches through evidence-based assessment frameworks
Integrate advanced digital sustainability research project principles with broader sustainability frameworks to address complex organizational and societal challenges

modules.name: Advanced Digital Sustainability Strategy
modules.description: Strategic approaches to implementing sustainable digital transformation
learning_outcomes: Hypothesize long-term environmental initiatives to enhance environmental performance
Critique the theoretical foundations and emerging trends in organizational sustainability integration to support sustainable development goals
Judge ethical leadership in promoting advanced digital sustainability strategy solutions that prioritize environmental stewardship
Critically evaluate the effectiveness of advanced digital sustainability strategy approaches through evidence-based assessment frameworks
Integrate advanced advanced digital sustainability strategy principles with broader sustainability frameworks to address complex organizational and societal challenges

modules.name: Sustainable Software Development
modules.description: Practices for developing environmentally efficient software
learning_outcomes: Strategize sustainable coding practices in circular economy applications
Design innovative solutions using energy-efficient software development to address complex sustainability challenges to enhance environmental performance
Create software solutions that minimize environmental impact while maintaining performance
Recommend ethical leadership in promoting sustainable software development solutions that prioritize environmental stewardship
Critically evaluate the effectiveness of sustainable software development approaches through evidence-based assessment frameworks
Integrate advanced sustainable software development principles with broader sustainability frameworks to address complex organizational and societal challenges

modules.name: Sustainable IT Leadership
modules.description: Leading organizational change toward sustainable digital practices
learning_outcomes: Conceptualize sustainability principles in circular economy applications
Formulate the theoretical foundations and emerging trends in sustainable technology practices for addressing environmental challenges
Generate innovative solutions using digital sustainability approaches to address complex sustainability challenges in circular economy applications
Compose solutions that balance environmental, social, and economic considerations in practical scenarios
Evaluate ethical leadership in promoting sustainable it leadership solutions that prioritize environmental stewardship
Critically evaluate the effectiveness of sustainable it leadership approaches through evidence-based assessment frameworks
Integrate advanced sustainable it leadership principles with broader sustainability frameworks to address complex organizational and societal challenges
